public abstract class AbstractProjector
extends PlanetGen

Abstract base class for projections

Method Detail

cacheParameters

public void cacheParameters()
This method must be called once before projection starts to cache the parameter values in this object to avoid repeated calls to retrieve them during the recursive terrain generation.

Overrides:
cacheParameters in class PlanetGen

setcolours

protected void setcolours()
Set up all the colour shades that will be used. The basic set of colours are interpolated to give a range of shades

Smooth the shading

fillRGB

public void fillRGB(int x,
                    int y,
                    int[] col)
Get the colour component of a pixel at the specified coordinates the supplied array will be set to the correct colour.

Parameters:
x - The x coordinate to be retrieved
y - The y coordinate to be retrieved
col - The colour array to be used to store the colour
